attributes.title: Lobor
attributes.season: ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series''
attributes.3: yes==Behind the scenes==*If Ethan Forrester chooses to send Erik to the Wall in "Iron From Ice", he will be shown being assigned to the Stewards instead of Lobor in "The Sword in the Darkness".==References==ReflistWatch navboxCategory:CharactersCategory:Telltale Games Series CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:Status: AliveCategory:Stewards of the Night's Watch

sections.Behind the scenes: *If [[Ethan Forrester]] chooses to send [[Erik]] to [[the Wall]] in "[[Iron From Ice]]", he will be shown being assigned to the Stewards instead of Lobor in "[[The Sword in the Darkness]]".
sections.Biography:
==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Lobor is present during the speech [[Frostfinger]] gives to the "graduating" recruits. Lobor is assigned to the Stewards.<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
